name: 抱你十个世纪
content: 若有你我永远没有痛悲
让我抱你抱你十个世纪
You see I’m crazy for you
真心爱你这句话太古老
I’m crazy for you Crazy for you
亦已醉了半个没法再饮
You see I’m crazy for you
真心爱你这句话太古老
真心爱你这句话太古老
I’m crazy for you Crazy for you
Crazy for you Crazy for you
是已倾诉 I’m crazy for you
我你拥抱 I’m crazy crazy for you
是已倾诉 I’m crazy for you
我你拥抱 I’m crazy for you
I’m crazy for you I’m crazy for you
